name: NOAA ENC Direct to GIS
description: Comprehensive access to display, query, and download all available large scale NOAA ENC data in a variety of GIS/CAD formats, using web mapping services. NOAA ENC data are in International Hydrographic Organization (IHO) S-57 format, representing the U.S. coastal and marine environment with features such as coastal topography, bathymetry, landmarks, geographic place names, and marine boundaries.
